metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000180 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Bouncy Castle BC 1.54 - 1.59, BC-FJA 1.0.0, BC-FJA 1.0.1 and earlier have aflaw in the Low-level interface to RSA key pair generator, specifically RSAKey Pairs generated in low-level API with added certainty may have less M-Rtests than expected. This appears to be fixed in versions BC 1.60 beta 4and later, BC-FJA 1.0.2 and later.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
